alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Otsego County through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edmeston, or 12 miles west of Cooperstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Middlefield, Hartwick, Cooperstown, Edmeston, Westville, Pittsfield, Springfield, Richfield Springs and Burlington. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 near 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
